  • Method Details

    • updatePlayerJoined

      void updatePlayerJoined(Game game, String nickname)
      To send the update that a player has joined the game
      Parameters:
      game - : the game that the player joined
      nickname - : the nickname of the player who joined

    • update

      void update(Game game, GameEvent gameEvent)
      To send the update that a gameEvent has occurred to a game
      Parameters:
      game - : the game where the gameEvent happened
      gameEvent - : the gameEvent that occurred

    • update

      void update(Game game, PlayerEvent playerEvent, Player playerWhoUpdated, String playerNicknameWhoUpdated)
      To send the update that a playerEvent has occurred to a player
      Parameters:
      game - : the game where the playerEvent happened
      playerEvent - : the playerEvent that occurred
      playerWhoUpdated - : the player who has thrown the playerEvent
      playerNicknameWhoUpdated - : the nickname of the player who has thrown the playerEvent

    • updateException

      void updateException(String error, String playerNicknameWhoUpdated)
      To send the update that an exception has occurred
      Parameters:
      error - : the error that occurred
      playerNicknameWhoUpdated - : the nickname of the player who has thrown the exception

    • updateTurnChanged

      void updateTurnChanged(String playerNickname)
      To send the update that an exception has occurred
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - : the nickname of the player whose turn changed

    • updatePlayerConnectionStatus

      void updatePlayerConnectionStatus(Game game, String playerNickname, boolean inGame)
      To send the update that a player has changed his connectionStatus
      Parameters:
      game - : the game where the player who changed his connectionStatus was playing
      playerNickname - : the nickname of the player whose ConnectionStatus changed
      inGame - : true if the player is in the game, false otherwise

    • updatePlayerLeft

      void updatePlayerLeft(Game game, String playerNicknameWhoLeft)
      To send the update that a player has left the game
      Parameters:
      game - : the game where the player who left was playing
      playerNicknameWhoLeft - : the nickname of the player who left

    • updateGameRunningStatus

      void updateGameRunningStatus(Game game, GameRunningStatus gameRunningStatus)
      To send the update that the gameRunningStatus has changed
      Parameters:
      game - : the game whose gameRunningStatus has changed
      gameRunningStatus - : the new gameRunningStatus of the game

    • updatePlayerReady

      void updatePlayerReady(String playerNickname)
      To send the update that a player is ready
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - : the nickname of the player who is ready
